titles.title: Congratulating the University of Washington on the occasion of its 150th anniversary and recognizing its contributions to Washington State and the United States.
Congratulating the University of Washington on the occasion of its 150th anniversary and recognizing its contributions to Washington State and the United States.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Education and the Workforce.

bill.summary:
Honors the University of Washington on its sesquicentennial for its distinguished legacy of academic excellence, pathbreaking research, and partnership with its community.
Congratulates its students, faculty, staff, and alumni.
